ResearchProjectDef.label: Brick Manufacturing I
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Unlocked Structures - Mud Pit - Mud Brick Cast
Unlocked Resources - Mud - Dried Mud Brick - Wet Mud Brick
Allows the creation of bricks and unlocks the following research groups: - Wall Structures I - Information Technologies I

ResearchProjectDef.label: Brick Manufacturing II
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Unlocked Structures - Mud Pit - Mud Brick Cast
Unlocked Resources - Mud - Dried Mud Brick - Wet Mud Brick
Allows the creation of bricks and unlocks the following research groups: - Wall Structures I - Information Technologies I
